text: 16:20 Aposel 5:12; 14:3; 1 Korin 2:4-5; Hibru 2:3-4Ezɨ suren gumaziba nguazir kamɨn danganiba bar dar ghuava akam akuri. Ezɨ Ekiam me ko ingara uan akam gavgavim a ganɨga mirakelɨn araziba sara akakasi, kamaghɨn gumazamiziba fo, akar kam a guizbangɨra.16:9-20 Fofozir gumazir avɨriba Sapta 16, ves 9ɨn ikegha ghua 20ɨn tuzir akabav gɨa ghaze, Mak uabɨ an osirizir pu, gumazir mam gɨn an osiri.
